<s>[INST] I want to shoot an action sequence in New York city. I need a train station, police station, bus station and an indoor mall. Classify on the basis of genre, location type, geo location, distance, time of year, vehicles, props, products and special instructions in json form. [/INST] 

Example: {
  "genre": "Action, adventure",
  "location_type": ["Train station", "Police station", "Bus station", "Indoor mall"],
  "geo_location": "New York City",
  "distance": "none specified",
  "time_of_year": "none specified",
  "vehicles": ["Train", "Police car", "Bus"],
  "props": "none specified",
  "products": "none specified",
  "special_instructions": "none specified"
} </s>

<s>[INST] I want to shoot 3-4 sports scenes involving a baseball stadium, a nearby hotel preferrably near downtown in November. Classify on the basis of genre, location type, geo location, distance, time of year, vehicles, props, products and special instructions in json form. [/INST]

  "vehicles": "none specified",

} </s>

<s>[INST] I would like to shoot a legal drama with a few scenes involving a courtroom, police station and a correction facility. } </s>

} </s>
